THE OHIO STATE UNIVERSITY
TELECOMMUNICATIONS CENTER
2470 NORTH STAR ROAD
COLUMBUS 21, OHIO
Richard B. Hull, Executive Director
October 2, 1961
Mr. William Harley
N.A.E.B.
1346 Connecticut Ave., N.W.
WAshington 6, D.C.
Dear Billj
Have just read Dave Stewart*s recent memorandum in re resignation of Larry
Dennis who is joining the Peace Corps permanently. Can you tell me who the
likely candidate will be? Is there a possibility you could be chairman?
How could this be stimulated?
Sincerely,
Richard B. Hull
